attributes.action: Basic First Aid Training to be Taught in Secondary Schools.
attributes.additional_details: This is something that is of national interest that I’m sure a majority would be in favour of. The government have the power to reach the whole nation in order to enforce this vital part of education and I believe if this was enforced by the government a large majority of people would be in favour of it. We should all know basic first aid, it could be the difference between life and death.
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for basic first aid training to be taught in schools (e.g CPR, Heimlich). Whether this be during PE or Science lessons - this should be a core part of the curriculum. After recent events in the news it has raised awareness how important it is to have basic first aid training

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
